sources.autograph: Op. 52 no. 2 of [May] 1795 ('opera grande') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue
sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 39 no. 7 (Book 3 no. 1; for title and comment, see No. 234)
sources.modern_edition: (c. 1930?), Leipzig, Peters: Op. 39 no. 1 (separate parts; revised by R. Hofmann). This edition was re-published c. 1943? by the International Music Co., New York

entries.notes: MSS.: No MSS. of any kind are known.

arrangements.description: Of the first and fourth movements, as part of a quartet (no. 3) for clarinet, flute, horn and bassoon, by O. Van den Broek, c. 1810 (see No. 262)
Of the fourth movement, as part of a guitar quintet, by Boccherini himself (see No. 449)
